title: Squire armor
summaries: Squire armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep after defeating any mechanical boss, for the price of 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total, which consists of the Squire's Great Helm, Squire's Plating, and Squire's Greaves.
A full set of Squire armor provides the following benefits:

• +58 defense
  • +15% melee damage
  • +30% minion damage
  • +15% / +20% melee critical strike chance
  • +20% movement speed
  • +2 sentry slots
  • +2 / +4 HP/second health regeneration

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the velocity of the Ballista sentries' projectiles and will increase the maximum number of enemies that can be pierced by them from 3 to 6. It also grants the wearer the Ballista Panic! buff upon taking any damage, which increases the fire rate of all Ballista sentries summoned by the player for 5 seconds.
The Valhalla Knight armor can be considered a direct upgrade of the Squire armor.
